name: Siege of Trees, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: As siege of trees, but you can affect larger-sized plants. Each plant acts as a catapult of its size.
target_zh: 每3个施法者等级一株巨型，超大型或大型植物
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同蛛行术 (Spider Climb)，不过你可以将持续时间以10分钟为单位分配给接触到的复数生物。
